name: Uberall
slogan: Changing How Businesses Around the World Connect With Nearby Consumers
description:
We help companies gain greater control over their online presence and reputation with software solutions to deliver a memorable ‘Near Me’ Brand Experience — from online interactions to offline sales.

As a global SaaS provider, we build a bridge between the online and offline worlds. Our software solutions gives companies optimal online visibility — so businesses can easily connect with concumers at all the online touch points they have with the local outlets of a brand, from finding, persuading, buying and recommending, to returning as a regular customer.



The Founding Story

Longtime friends and business partners David Federhen and Florian Hübner shared the vision to bridge the online and offline world more effectively, so companies could generate new customers, build customer relationships and increase their sales.

They created a platform that would connect companies with local customers through search and discovery, engagement and conversion — and in 2013, Uberall was born.


We Empower Your Business to Deliver Outstanding Experiences to Nearby Consumers

The rise of mobile search has been the game changer in recent marketing history, radically transforming consumer behaviour.

Today’s consumers are accessing a vast digital ecosystem with their smartphones, laptops, watches, voice assistants and more. They search for a product or service on Google or Bing, look at other customers' reviews on Facebook or Trustpilot and ask their language assistant Siri or navigation device for the way to business.

The customer journey hasn't been linear for a long time — and if you want to win customers over, you have to provide a seamless user experience: on all devices, all search engines and all online platforms where customers search for companies.

jobs.title: (Senior) Customer Success Manager (m/w/d) - Berlin, DE
jobs.description:
We’re a mighty team of more than 250 creative thinkers, experienced leaders, passionate innovators and some of the friendliest folks you’ll ever meet. We work remotely and in-person at six offices around the globe, with headquarters in Berlin. We like to refer to ourselves as Uberallers, too. 
                                                           
In 2013, Uberall was born out of the vision by longtime friends and business partners David Federhen and Florian Hübner. They wanted to bridge the online and offline world more effectively, so companies could generate new customers, build customer relationships and increase their sales. They created a platform that would connect companies with local customers through search and discovery, engagement and conversion.

Our SaaS platform enables multi-location brands and businesses to boost their online presence. Our customers are as large as KFC, BP and DHL (and others whose names are not entirely made of capital letters!) and as small as your local independent coffee shop or record store. 

Some customers work directly with us, and many more engage with our platform via Reseller Partners around the world. More than one million business locations trust the Uberall platform to manage the connections with their customers and prospects on the search engines, platforms and directories that matter.

Learn more at www.uberall.com.

**About the role:**

As a Senior Customer Success Manager (m/f/d) you will help our wide array of international Enterprise customers to navigate the various Uberall products and educate them on how to generate a positive Return-on-Invest. Together with our colleagues from Customer Operations, the Customer Success Team is the face of Uberall towards our customers and we take a lot of pride in delivering the best service possible. You will be the perfect fit for this role, if you are - compassionate, strategic-minded and dedicated, combined with a deep understanding of how businesses work. 

**Your responsibilities:**

* You are responsible for the strategic positioning and implementation of our products with the customer
* Maintain product expertise across all Uberall products
* You identify customer-specific goals and, based on them, develop customised, optimal solutions for the use and application of our product
* You are always close to the customer, continuously identifying individual optimisation potential, developing concepts for its implementation and implementing them in cooperation with the customer
* You know your customer's performance KPIs, anticipate their next step and provide them with guidance towards the desired outcome
* You are the first problem solver, accompany our customers, never leave them alone at different levels of escalation, and define measures and solutions with them. It is important for you to solve a problem for the customer sustainably and optimally
* You work on maintaining and growing the value of your account portfolio
* You conduct in-person business reviews with C-level decision-makers and other relevant stakeholders
 
**Your profile:**

*	5+ years of relevant experience in Customer Success or similar field (account management, pro services, consulting, technology enablement) 
* Ideally, consulting and professional project management background in a SaaS company and/or start-up (software technology, SaaS, cloud services, etc.)
*	You understand the ecosystem and the interests of your customers, based upon which you can deduce service strategies and establish processes
*	You have a high degree of communicative skills, sales talent, high-quality consulting skills as well as entrepreneurial thinking
*	You are very analytical, tech-savvy, have very good Excel skills and, ideally, knowledge of SEO
*	You work in a very structured and forward-looking manner, keep the overview in sight, are attentive and do not let anything disturb you
*	You can prioritise in a goal-oriented manner while remaining flexible
*	Willingness to travel up to 25%
*	An academic degree or equivalent vocational training 
*	Fluency in German and business proficiency in English

 
**What we offer:**

* A market-leading and cutting-edge location marketing software (SaaS) scale up with an exciting & international customer base
* A very exciting position in close collaboration with a highly professional team in Uberall’s headquarter
* International team and regular company & team events
* A lively and open company culture with flat hierarchies and short chains of command
* Flexible working hours, an attractive budget for professional development and regular feedback sessions to assist you with your career plans
* Coming from abroad? - We are offering an extensive relocation package including visa, temporary and permanent accommodation, etc.
* Regular language classes, meditation sessions and our own gym
* You are a dog person? - There will be room in the office as well
* A high degree of responsibility with creative freedom and personal advancement avenues.
* One of Germany’s fastest-growing companies (awarded by KPMG, Axel Springer & Gründerszene) with a global orientation and market leadership in EMEA

* You are going to execute against strategy while maintaining a positive collaborative relationship with  various stakeholders

* Minimum of 2 years’ experience in a digital marketing agency or similar
* Proven experience and success in managing a variety of digital marketing campaigns
* Well-versed in performance marketing, conversion, and online customer acquisition
* Strong understanding of wider digital marketing channels and how they work together
* Experience using Excel and Google Sheets and very comfortable interpreting and manipulating data
* Strong experience building new campaigns quickly and accurately across multiple channels

**Your responsibilities:**

* Develop company-wide Digital Agency-specific strategic partnership plans designed to meet revenue goals and support a growing portfolio of accounts.
* Carry global responsibility for retention, upsells, and predominantly acquisition of new partners in the digital agency vertical, collaborating closely with our Partner Acquisition and Partner Growth Managers
* Expected to engage in direct sales activities with key accounts, senior agency industry leaders and top agency advisors.
* Further, strengthen Uberall relationships with key agency partners from the end-user to the senior leadership level.
* Train entire partnerships team on agency best practices and processes as we continue to grow.
* Responsible for the planning of best-in-class events, productive prospect and customer on-site meetings, external & internal training sessions and highly effective trade show participation to further build Uberall brand awareness, strengthen relationships, share your industry knowledge with our partner-facing teams and drive revenue.
* Participate in Planning and Governance for this segment.
* Continuously work to increase growth and secure profitability.
* Identify, test and develop new partners and serve as their consultant supporting their revenue-driving pursuits.
* Develop strategies and action plans within Uberall and together with your agency partners to ensure delivery related to growth and profitability. 
* Create forecasts and follow up on KPIs.
* Manage external and internal collaborations.
* This role reports to the EVP Strategic Partnerships and will have a strong working relationship with the CRO and the Leadership Team of Uberall. 


**Your profile:**

* 10+ years in digital agency roles or agency-adjacent roles
* An extensive network of relationships at key agency accounts including top tier agencies and industry advisors
* Excellent sales management skills to advise sales team and set overall agency partnerships strategy for Uberall
* Results-oriented, self-motivated and strong multi-tasker with strong problem solving and negotiation skills
* Hands-on approach paired with a contagious can-do attitude
* Is highly collaborative in approach, has a curious mind, is open-minded to testing and trying new approaches and is motivated by being in a dynamic, growing fast-paced environment

* 18 days PTO annually + holidays
* Excellent health/dental/vision insurance
* Flexible working hours, an attractive budget for professional development and regular feedback sessions to assist you with your career plans

* Regular company & team events
* A product you will be excited about - a market-leading cutting-edge location marketing software with an ever-growing international customer base

* A lively and open company culture with flat hierarchies and short chains of command
